BiblioData.Title: COATED COLLOIDAL MATERIALS
BiblioData.Abstract: Coated colloidal materials, methods for making coated colloidal materials, and methods of using coated colloidal materials are disclosed. The method yields coated colloidal materials where the optical characteristics of the core is not adversely affected. The coated colloidal materials can be self-assembled into films, layers, or structures and used in the detection of analytes through detection assays.

2. A coated colloidal material prepared by a method comprising: admixing a colloidal material, a surface passivating agent, and a coating agent in the presence of an optional catalyst.
